E si no n’es getada, lahoras aministra extraccio de lu am le instrument apelat gesti epicicarios subtil del qual aquesta es la forma:	And if it is not removed, then administer the extraction of it with an instrument called a delicate epichirurgic forceps, of which this is the form:
E si es foro-getada am gesti, bo es; e sino, lahoras aministra la extraccio de lu am onci subtil de pauca duplicacio.	And if it is forgotten with the forceps, then use these; and if not, administer the extraction of it with a very thin instrument with a slight bend.
E donc si no es foro-getada per aquo, lahoras fay una canula de aram e entromet la extremitat de la canula en le trauc de la aurelha e claus a l’enviro de la canula am cera e am oli mollificada per so que no sia ubert sino la canula.	And therefore, if it is not forgotten, make a cannula of thread and insert the end of the cannula into the canal of the ear, sealing around the cannula with wax and soft oil so that only the cannula opens.
E aprop extratz am le tieu vent am fort atraccio, quar tropas veguadas cum aquo que havem recontat.	And then extract the small wind with great force, as we have seen.
Mays si no es foro-getada en aquesta manieyra, lahoras pren de halka alumbat o de vecz aparelhat am le qual son preses les ausels una patita quantitat, e pausa aquel en la extremitat de ray, e aprop envolopa sobre aquel coto decentment pausat.	If it is not forgotten in this manner, take a piece of hot metal or some kind of heated apparatus with which the outer shell of the object is carefully wrapped at its tip.
E aprop entromet aquel en le trauc de la aurelha am facilitat, e aprop excicca la aurelha de la humiditat.	And then insert it into the canal of the ear with ease and remove the ear from the moisture.
E donc si no es foro-getada am totas las causas las quals havem recontadas, lahoras tu coyta a talhar aquela denant que endevengua apostema caut o espasme.	And therefore, if it is not forgotten with all the causes we have seen, then tie off that which causes abscess or spasms.
E la manieyra de talhar aquela es que tu al comensament sancnes le malaute de la vena sephasica e extratz del sanc segon la mannieyra de la vertut de lu, e aprop fay aquel cezer entre las tuas mas e converteys l’aurelha a las partidas desus, e fen am petita fissura en la razit de la aurelha deves lo greys de lu en le loc be premegut de lu.	And the method of dissection is that you begin by cauterizing the affliction in the saphenous vein and extract the clot according to the virtue of the wound, then make an incision between your fingers and convert the edge towards the openings from which it came, and make a small fissure at the base of the edge where the thick part of it was previously pressed.
E sia la fissura de figura lunar entro que pervengua a la peyra, e, la peyra atrobada, osta aquela si podes am instrumentz apropriatz; e aprop cos la fissura en aquela hora am velocitat, e cura aquela entro que sia sanat.	And if the fissure resembles a crescent moon and reaches the base of the finger, and once the nail is observed, you can use appropriate instruments; then immediately apply pressure to the fissure with great speed and treat it until it heals.
E si la causa cazent en la aurelha es un dels gras que creysso e so inflatz, lahoras aministra la curacio e la extraccio de lu; mays si no obezeys a tu ad eyssiment, lahoras tu pren spatum teune subtil segon aquesta forma:	And if the cause of the pain in the nail is one of the inflamed and swollen substances, then administer treatment and extract it; however, if you do not obey my instruction, then take some fine sponge and use it according to this method:
e aministra am aquel la abscizio de aquel gra lo qual es cazut en l’aurelha.	and apply that for the removal of the fallen substance from the nail.
E no fassas aquo quan cogitas que aquel ja es humectat per la vapor del aurelha, e pausa aquel en motas pessas, e prop extratz ne aquelas am les oncis o am gesti subtil, o ab inscizio ayssi co dit havem, quar es alleujada la extraccio de lu.	And do not attempt this when you think that the part is already moistened by the heat of the body, stop it with heavy weights, and extract it gently from its position or with a subtle gesture, or by incision as we have said, for it eases the extraction.
Mays en l’aygua la qual es intrada en l’aurelha cove que·l malaute use de sternutacio am condizi al comensament, e omple la sieua aurelha am alcu coto vielh, e jagua sobre aquela aurelha en la qual es l’aygua, e si per aquo es foro-getada, bo es; e sino, lahoras pren tropas peyras teunas e leons segon la longitut del dit, e calfa aquelas en le foc un pauc, e le pacient entrometa una de aquelas en le trauc de la sua aurelha e saute sobre la un pe sieu de aquela partida e percussia am una autra peyra sobre la peyra la qual es dintz la aurelha.	In the water that enters the ear, consider how this condition begins with sneezing and fills the ear with some old or young wax, then pour over the ear in which the water is located, and if it is expelled through that opening, it is good; otherwise, take a few hot stones from the fire, slightly warm them, and the patient should insert one of those into the canal of his ear and jump on one foot, pressing hard with the other stone on the stone next to the ear.
Donc no cesse aquo am peyra entro que tota l’aygua sia foro-getada.	Therefore, do not stop until all the water is expelled.
E ja l’aygua sira foro-getada enayssi que tu prenguas de papier o de gonc i, e met la una extremetat de lu en l’aurelha e estendas l’autre extremitat am foc entro que sia comburit le may de lu.	And water should be drawn as you would from a paper or cloth container, place one end in the ear and extend the other end over the fire until the whole of it is burned away.
E prop met i autre gonc e fay aquo tantas veguadas entro que tota l’aygua sia foro-getada, e stratz aquel am canula ayssi co desus es dit de la peyra extrasadora.	Then place another cloth over it and do this several times until all the water is drawn out, and tear that from the cannula as is usually done with the stone extractor.
Mays en la extraccio de bestia intrant en aquela aurelha, si es a petit cos, ayssi piussa e a lu semblant, cura aquel ayssi cum havem dit en la divisio; mays si es de gran cos la qual causa apar al sen del vezement, lahoras aministra la extraccio de lu am gesti e oncis, e la causa de lu es pus leugiera de totas las autras causas que cazo en l’aurelha.	In the extraction of a foreign body from the ear, if it is small and resembles one another, treat it as we have said in division; but if it is a large object which causes an appearance at the sense of the disease, then administer the extraction of it by gesture and incision, and the cause of it is usually lighter than all other causes that affect the ear.
Mays en la extraccio de verm engendrat en la aurelha, quan tu curas aquel am aquo que havem dit en la divisio e en le tractat de distillacios e no comfereys la tua curacio, lahoras cove que tu reguardes la aurelha al solelh.	However, in the extraction of worms grown in the ear, when you treat it with water as we have said in division and in the distillation treatment and do not agree with your care, then watch that you protect the ear from sunlight.
E donc si apar aqui alcuna causa dels verms, lahoras extratz aquel am gesti o am onci subtils, mays si no apar deguna causa, lahoras pren una canula dejos streyta e desus ampla de la qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And thus, if any cause of the worms appears here, then extract them with your fingers or some subtle tools, but if no cause is apparent, take a tube that is narrow at one end and wide at the other, which is the form of it.
E entromet la extremitat subtil en la aurelha segon la quantitat la qual suffertar puesca le malaute; e aprop sucgeys am aquela per succio fort, e fay aquo motas veguadas, entro que totz les verms sian foro-gitatz.	Then insert the very fine end into the ear according to the amount of suffering caused by the illness; and then suck with a strong suction, making movements as you do so, until all the worms are expelled.
Mays si no obezeysso a tu al ayssiment, lahoras tu opila e claus en le circuit de la canula am cera ayssi cum havem dit; lahoras aministre distillacios las quals han ja esproadas les antics en la curacio dels verms, e atrobaras aquo en le tractat de distillacios.	If you do not follow these instructions, then heat and close the tube in the manner as we have said; administer distilleries which have already been prepared in the treatment of worms, and you will find this in the section on distillation treatments.
E sia la tua efusio am la qual efundas les olis medicinas en la aurelha am aquest strument del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And your pouring of medicinal oils into the ear should be done with this instrument, which has this form.
E fay aquela de argent o de eram, dejos streyt, en le qual sia un petit trauc, e am pla desus.	And make a small, narrow incision, leaving it open, and apply a bandage over it.
E donc sia cum empellent a que es en la conquavitat de la canula de continent aqui on sira necessari.	And thus it is with the use of something that is in the cavity of the container here, it will be necessary.
E si vols, pren le ray e envolveys en la extremitat de lu decentment coto, e aprop gieta oli en la concavitat del auziment, o suc de alcuna herba, o aquo que vols de aquestas medicinas en la canula — e aquela es en la aurelha —, e aprop entromet le ray am coto desus e exprem am la tua ma aquel am compressio temprada de lu entro que l’oli sia expellit en la concavitat del auziment e le malaute senta le oli dedintz.	And if you want, take the ray and wrap it at the decent end, then pour oil into the cavity of the hearing or any herbal juice or whatever you prefer from these medicines in the canula — in the ear —, and then insert the ray near the edge and squeeze with your hand so that the oil is expelled into the cavity of the hearing and the patient feels relief within.
E aquo que sia enfundut en la aurelha sia ja scalfat am foc un petit.	And what is inserted into the ear should already be scorched with a small flame.
E guarda te que la causa la qual distillaras en l’aurelha no sia trop frega, quar las medicinas de aurelha no suffertan aquo.	And be careful that the cause which you distill into the ear is not too harsh, because the ear medications do not tolerate this.
Capitol .vii.	Chapter .VII.
De curacio de opilacio de aurelhas.	On the treatment of ear inflammation.
Alcunas veguadas alcus enfantz yeysso dels ventres de lors mayres no-perforatz, e aquo ja accideys en alcus homes, opilacio en le meat de la aurelha per plagua o per carn nada en aquela; e aquesta opilacio alcunas veguadas es fayta en le preon del trau de la aurelha la qual no consiec le vezement, e alcunas veguadas es en las partidas defora.	Sometimes, children's bellies may swell without any apparent reason, and this also happens to some adults; inflammation in the flesh of the ear due to an infection or some other flesh damage; and this inflammation may be internal or external.
E aquela que accideys en le preon de lu, la qual no comprehen le vezement, es en las majors disposicios de dificil sanacio.	And the one that occurs in the internal part, which does not understand the cause, is in the most difficult situations for healing.
E en aquela en qual consegueys le vezement, cove que tu pauses la aurelha del malaute al solelh e reguarda en aquela.	And in the case where you can see the cause, take the patient's ear to the sun and examine it.
E donc si vezes oppulacio apparent, obre aquela am espatum subtil del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And if you see inflammation appearing, open that with a fine, sharp instrument from which this form comes:
Si’ la extremitat de lu en la qual sia petita la latitut, del qual la una partida sia aguda e l’autra no; e le spatum sia de dos latz leon per so que no fassa lizio al aurelha.	If the extremity of the limb in which the tightness is felt has one part sharp and the other not, and the knife's edge is of two lengths to prevent it from cutting into the skin.
E donc si la opilacio es per carn nascuda en la aurelha o en le meat de lu, lahoras te aquela am oncis subtils e incidiys aquela vehement facilitat entro que sia ostada tota la carn.	And so if the incision is for a bone lodged in the ear or in the flesh, then you make subtle cuts and carefully incise until all the flesh is removed.
E si opilacio es en le preon de la aurelha, lahoras pren ray subtil leon e escalfa aquel am foc un pauc, e aprop met aquel en le meat de l’aurelha.	And if the incision is in the root of the ear, take a fine blade and heat it slightly with fire, then gently insert it into the flesh of the ear.
E donc si as scentit oppulacio am aquo que le malaute atroba am facilitat, per gravetat de ausir, esforsa la oppressio de lu am facilitat; e guarda te que no plagues les nervis del aurelha.	And so if you sense an obstruction that the patient finds easy to expel due to its severity, exert pressure on it to facilitate its release; but be careful not to irritate the nerves of the ear.
E aprop pausa en l’aurelha drap de li segon la quantitat del ample del trauc lo qual tu as envolvutz en l’enguent egipciac; e fay aquo per alcus jorns entro que sias segur de la consolidacio de la plagua; o que prenguas qualgua e enfon aquela en ayguaros e pulveriza sobre lu segi trissat e usa de lu; e si vezes la aurelha ja esser apostemada, lahoras cove que tu estraguas la qualgua e permutes aquela am autra qualgua la qual tu envoloparas en cerot que sia fayt am oli rozat, entro que sia le apostema caut cedat; e aprop cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	Then wrap the ear with a cloth according to the amount of space in which you have applied the Egyptian ointment, and do this for several days until you are sure of the healing of the wound; or soak it in water and pour that onto the affected area after drying it, then use another cloth. If the ear has already formed a crust, be careful not to destroy it and replace the cloth with one dipped in oil, as long as the infection shows signs of improving; and tend to it until it is healed.
Mays si accideys flux de sanc, lahoras submergeys esponga o drap en aygua frega e pausa sobre la aurelha, e usa del autra curacio la qual restrengeys le flux del sanc, la qual es dita en le tractat de distillacio.	If a bleeding occurs, submerge the exposed or drape in lukewarm water, apply pressure over the wound, and use other treatments that restrict blood flow, which are described in the distillation treatment.
Capitol .viii.	**Chapter VIII**
De cura de athezil le qual endeveno a las palpebras.	**On the treatment of atrophy affecting the eyelids.**
Athezil les quals endeveno a las paupebras dels huels alcuna veguada so humitz, alscunas veguadas son secs.	Atrophy of the eyelids, sometimes caused by moisture, at other times by dryness.
Donc cove que tu tenguas aquels am tenhalhas o am onci, e inscindas aquels am espatum de las suas razitz, e aprop pausa sobre les locs segi trissat.	Therefore, you should have those ointments or liniments at hand, remove the hardened matter from their roots, and apply pressure over the sealed areas.
Mays si dolor am flux de sanc veno, lahoras tu cauteriza aquels am cauteri lanticular subtil.	If pain accompanied by blood flow occurs, then you may use a fine, alternating hot and cold cautery.
E la milhor cauterizacio es aprop las inscizios e tropas veguadas retornam quan reman alcuna causa de sas razitz; e quan so cauterizadas am foc, aquelas razitz son comburidas e no retornan.	And the best cautery is to make incisions and watch for any signs of their reopening; and when cauterized with fire, those wounds are burned away and do not reopen.
Capitol .ix.	**Chapter IX.**
Cura de grandeyssa que veno a las palpebras dels huels.	**Treatment for a severe condition that comes to the eyelids of the eyes.**
Motas veguadas endeve en las palpebras dels huels alcuna causa la qual es asemblada a grandissa en sa fortalicia e duricia, e per so grandissia es apelada.	**Motives observed on the eyelids of the eyes, due to some cause that resembles a great deal in its strength and hardness, are therefore called 'great'.**
E es agreguacio de humiditat grossa en la palpebra dejos e desus.	**And there is an addition of thick moisture on the lower and upper eyelids.**
Donc la opperacio en lor es que consideras lahoras si la grandissia es procedent en lu en aquo que apar de la palpebra e es mauguda a tota partida; e la causa de lu es leugiera.	**Therefore, the operation on them considers whether the greatness is proceeding from within, appearing from the eyelid and affecting the whole; and the cause of it is slight.**
Donc fen sobre aquela am fissura per la latitut, e aprop escorga aquela de tota partida am facilitat entro que evasesca, e aprop suspen aquela am onci e abscindeys aquela.	Therefore, open that wide fissure according to its extent, and then carefully extract it, suspending it from one side and cutting it off.
Mays si a tu no es apparelhada la incizio de lu si no pus que penetras la palpebra am inscizio pauc a pauc, lahoras aquo no notz en deguna causa.	If the beginning of the hernia is not visible, but it is only felt, then do not immediately make a large incision, but instead gently penetrate the eyelid with a small incision. In this way, you will not notice it for any reason.
E si la figura es gran, lahoras tu l’ajusta am sutura; e cura aquela entro que sia sanada.	If the hernia is large, then adjust it with stitches; treat it until it is healed.
E si es pauca, a tu no sobrevindra mal per aquela quar l’anguent de lu restaura aquela e encarna.	And if it is small, you will not suffer much because the natural healing of the hernia restores and incarnates it.
E si la grandissia es declinant a las partidas dedintz de la palpebra deves la superficia dedintz, lahoras evesa la palpebra e suspen la grandissia am onci, otra que tu indigescas de incizio, e prem aquela de tota part, e si la palpebra per inscizio es alonguada, aquo no notz en deguna causa.	And if the size is decreasing towards the inner parts of the eyelid, you must remove the surface, then lift the eyelid and suspend the hernia with stitches, except for where you initially made the incision, and press on it from all sides. If the eyelid, due to the incision, becomes elongated, it will not be noticed for any reason.
E aprop la incizio, lava le huel am aygua salada; e cura le loc am aquo que encarna entro que sia sanat.	And then make the incision, wash the wound with salty water; and treat the area with a poultice until it heals.
Capitol .x.	Chapter X.
De la cura axcirnah en la palpebra desus del huel.	On the treatment of an acute condition on the upper eyelid.
Axcirnath es grays le qual es engendrat en las tunicas de la palpebra desus, e majorment endeve als enfantz, agrava les huels de aquels et accideyso a lor catartz le mayti; e no podon reguardar la claror del solelh per aquo quar lagremas se coytan ad aquels.	Acute inflammation is caused by the swelling of the upper eyelid's tunics, often affecting children most severely, leading to clouding of their vision and preventing them from looking at the brightness of the sun, due to tears gathering at these eyes.
E per so tu vezes aquels jaser sobre les lors caras tot temps, e sobre les lors caras dormen; e so a las palpebras de lor dejos les sobrecils humidas, las quals ja ha cuberta imflacio, e iminencia de accernac apparent es en l’uelh; e que quant tu premes le loc am les tieus ditz, tu centes accernac entro aquels.	And so you apply these measures to their faces all the time, and to their eyes while they sleep; and the eyebrows remain wet from the inflammation that has already covered them, and the imminence of a discharge is apparent in the eye; and when you press the area with your fingers, you feel a discharge within those eyes.
E alcuna manieyra de opperacio es en aquel que le malaute pausa le sieu cap en le tieu se, e aprop pausa drap de li e de lu fay calgua, e fay de lu cercle segon la quantitat la qual contena arthernach de tota partida, e aprop pausa aquel sobre aquela e prem am les tieus ditz de tota per que sia agreguat arcernac en le mieg del cercle, e aprop fen en le mieg de aquela humiditat am spatum inscident am fissura per la latitut, e la fissura no sia major que la fissura que es fayta en flaubotomia.	And in some manner of operation, when the patient's head is in the bed, then place a sheet over them and do some cold application, and make it circular according to the quantity that contains the arterioles from every part, and place that on this and press firmly on both sides of the joint so that additional fluid is added to the middle of the circle, and stop in the middle of that moistened area with a spatula incident to the fissure according to its extent, and the fissure should not be greater than the fissure made in flaubotomy.
Mays en le preon cove que tu fendas la codena tota entro que pervenguas ad arcernach, quar en las mays desposicios proceseys arcernach per fissura segon la forma de grayseza blanca.	Insert into the opening a plug that reaches to where you want to obtain arterioles, for in the case of more advanced procedures, arterioles are extracted through fissures according to the form of white greasiness.
Donc extratz aquela am draps los quals tu as envolopatz entre les tieus ditz a las partidas deforo e revolv entre la ma dextra e sinistre entro que sia dispargut.	Therefore, remove those sheets which you have wrapped between your fingers from the parts outside and turn them with your right and left hand until they are completely drained.
E guarda te que no ajustes en la fissura per so que am le spatum no pervenguas al huel e ladescas aquel.	And be careful not to press into the fissure, lest you prevent the sputum from reaching its goal and dislodging that one.
Mays si no apar a tu arternach en le comensament de la fissura, mays que tu ajustes en la fissura un petit am fecilitat entro que procesisca arternach; e aprop extratz aquela ayssi quo havem dit; e aprop submargeys draps de li en aygua e vi agre e pausa les sobre le loc e estrenh aquels am polvils.	If it does not appear that your treatment begins at the start of the fissure, you may adjust the fissure slightly to facilitate its progress; then extract that as we have said; and then immerse cloths from him in water and vinegar and place them over the area and apply those as powders.
E so alcus que trissan sal e pausan aquel en la conquavitat de la fissura per so que aquo que es remas de aquela humiditat.	And so some apply salt and place it in the cavity of the fissure to help draw out that which is removed by moisture.
E aprop cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	And then cure it until it is healed.
Mays si accideys en le loc apostema caut, lahoras cura aquel am emplastres cedatils entro que sia sanat.	If an accident occurs at the posthemous location, then apply care with plasters until it heals.
Capitol .xi.	Chapter .xi.
De manieyras de tactimi del huel.	On various ways of examining the pulse.
Quan en las palpebras dels huels so natz pels ajustatz dejos les pels naturals e so antiquatz, lahoras aquels noso al huel e fan endevenir manieras de malautias ayssi cum lacrimas assiduas e mollificacio de palpebras e tela entro que aquo sia causa de destruccio del huel que s’apela tactinir del huel, e cura se en quatre manieyras: o per cauteri am foc; o am medicina acuta segon que denant es dit en le capitol de cauteri; o es fayt atactini per inscizio e sutura; o per cannas segon que yeu diyre.	When the pulse in the eyelids appears due to the natural growth of hair and becomes antiquated, these conditions on the pulse lead to various ailments with constant tears and softening of the eyelids, causing destruction to the pulse known as "tactinir del huel," and its cure is carried out in four ways: either by cauterization with fire; or with acute medications as mentioned previously in the chapter on cauterization; or by incision and suturing; or through cannulas, as I will explain.
E donc cove que tu pauses le cap del malaute en le tieu se; aprop converteys la palpebra del uelh am la tua ma sinistra, e si es convertida, bo es; e sino, entromet agulha en aquela en la qual sia fiel de la partida pus dejos de la palpebra, e fay penetrar la agulha am fiel desus, e aquo sia — prop del marge de la palpebra en le qual naysso les pels — prop dels pels, e tira le fiel a las partidas desus am la palpebra, e converteys aquela am le ray.	And so you should place the focus of the ailment on the eye; then turn the eyelid of the affected eye with your left hand, and if it is turned, you are correct; otherwise, insert a needle into the area where there is a firm attachment of tissue from the eyelid, and make the needle penetrate through the tissue towards the edge of the eyelid where the hair begins, and pull the thread firmly away from the eyelid towards its inner side.
E aprop fen en la partida dedintz de la palpebra dejos les pels ajustatz am spatum inscidentz del lacrimal major entro al lacrimal mendre; e aprop extratz le fiel e pausa dejos la palpebra polvilhs petitz de coto o de drap, e aprop senha sobre la palpebra am tenta, e sia ayssi cum figura de fuelha de mirt.	And then carefully cut open the space between the eyelids, adjust the hairs with a sharp instrument so that they do not interfere with the flow of tears; take out the foreign body and place the eyelid back in position using small cotton or cloth wads, hold it firmly with your finger, and shape it like a moth's wing.
Mays empero cove que sia la figura segon la quantitat de helevacio de la palpebra, quar aquo ja es diversificat en les homes, quar de aquels es le quals indigeys que sia inscidit de la palpebra gran quantitat segon la quantitat per la qual la palpebra es mollificada.	However, it is necessary to consider that the shape varies according to the amount of swelling in the eyelid, for what is required in one case may be different in another, depending on the extent to which the eyelid becomes softened.
E aprop fen am le spatum sobre las doas linhas las quals has senhadas, e comensa del lacrimal major entro al lacrimal menor.	Then carefully cut with the scalpel along both lines that you have indicated, beginning at the lacrimal nerve where it enters the lacrimal duct.
E si’ la tua fissura prop dels pels naturals ayssi cum es la grossetut del rey.	And if your cut is near the natural hairs, it should be as thick as the king's beard.
E aprop met le onci en un dels dos angles de la codena, e aprop excoria aquela tota, e aprop ajusta am la scitura las doas labias am gula o fiel de lana subtil, e abstergeys le sanc, e fay adherir aquo que superflueys dels fiels sobre dos sobrecils am alcunas causas enviscans, si voles far aquo, e sino, non cures.	And then place the tongs in one of the two angles of the wound, scrape it entirely clean, and adjust the stitches with two threads, either silk or fine wool, rinse the blood, and let any excess from the threads adhere to the two eyebrows for certain reasons entangled, if you wish to do so, otherwise, do not treat it.
E aprop leyssa la sutura dels fiels entro a tres dias o quatre, e aprop cura aquo.	And then, after three or four days, open the suture of the threads and treat it.
E si vols, layssa la plagua ses sutura, e cura aquela am aquo que exsicca e constrenh, quar la palpebra es alevada deves la sigillacio de la plagua e la agreguacio de lu; mays sutura es milor E donc aysso diysso les antics de taxanir.	And if you wish, leave the wound open without suture, and treat it with what dries and constricts, because the eyelid is lifted due to the sealing of the wound and the addition of pus; but a tighter suture is better. Thus, I have told you the ancient practices of the taxanir.
Mays empero en lu sia sollicitut sobre le malaute, e es de bona operacio, e no es en lu temor.	But nevertheless, there is much effort on the part of the patient, and it is a good operation, and there is nothing to fear.
E es autra manieyra en taxmir, e es que senhes sobre la palpebra figura ayssi cum fuelha de mirt, e aprop eleva la palpebra am tres uncis segreguatz e congreguatz segon aquesta forma:	And there is another way to treat it, which is as follows: place a figure like a mushroom on the eyelid, then raise the eyelid with three sharp movements, separating and bringing together according to this form.
Mays si no es possible aquo, tener les uncis, e aquo no es engualhat, lahoras pren una agula en la qual haia fil e met aquela en le mieg de la figura, e entromet le autre fiel prop le lacrimal major, e·l fiel segon prop le lacrimal mendre, e ajusta entre les tieus ditz les fiels am equalitat, e aprop am aquels eleva la tua ma am elevacio engual, eleva tota la codena sobre la qual es senhat ayssi cum havem recomtat.	If this is not possible, having the knives at hand, and it is not cut, then take a needle with thread and insert one in the middle of the figure, and insert the other two close to the lacrimal glands, and adjust between them so that the threads are equal, and then lift your hand with an equal elevation, lifting all the eyelids over which the figures are placed as we have mentioned.
E aprop ajusta las doas labias de la plagua am sutura, e cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	And then adjust the two edges of the wound with sutures, and heal that which is clean.
Mays si accideys apostema deves la tua inscizio o la tua fissura, seda aquel apostema am cerot e a lu semblantz, e am enguentz.	If after your incision or opening, an abscess occurs, then treat it with wax and similar things, and clean it.
E alcunas veguadas endeve a la palpebra que·ls sieus pels sian convertitz, adonc cove que tu uses en aquela de aquo que havem dit de inscizio; mays sutura en quascus es mays artificial.	And in some cases, when the eyelids are affected and their hairs change, then use what we have mentioned about incision; a more artificial suture is done in some cases.
Ataxinir am cannas es segon aquesta forma:	To drain cans is done in this way:
e es que tu convertas la palpebra e scindas la figura qu’es dedintz segon que he recontat; e aprop per art fay doas cannas o doas astelas subtils de las quals longitut sia segon la longitut de la palpebra e la latitut de lor sia mendra de la latitut del spatum.	and it is that you turn the eyelid and incise the figure within as I have mentioned; then, with art, make two cans or two thin plates of which the length corresponds to the length of the eyelid and their width is measured according to the width of the space.
E tu ja has inscidit en las extremitatz de quascunas partidas, la on tenes les fils.	And you have already incised at the ends of each cut, where you hold the threads.
Aprop agregua quascuna am subtilitat subre aquo que superflueys de la palpebra del huel, e constres las cannas de quascunas partidas am fort strictura, e layssa aquela per alcus jorns, quar la codena per la strictura morira e sira denegada e se poyrira entro que per si meteyssa cayra.	Then add each one with subtlety over what exceeds from the eyelid of the patient, and tighten the cans of each cut with strong rigor, and leave it for some days, for the thread will die due to the tightness and will be rejected, and it will fall off once it has healed by itself.
Mays si es tardat, lahoras trenca la am las toroyras, e aprop cura la plagua entro que sia sanat.	If it is delayed, then cut open the abscesses, and treat the wound until it heals.
Donc cum es solidada, la palpebra es elevada e les pels no pungo.	Therefore, when it is solidified, the eyelid is raised and the skin does not hurt.
E aquesta es la forma de doas cannas las quals faras segon aquesta forma:	And this is the way to make two incisions according to this form:
e haia la quantitat de la longitut e de la latitut ni mays ni mens.	and it should have the quantity of length and breadth neither more nor less.
Capitol .xii.	Chapter XII
De elevacio de pels pungentz en le huel am agula quan le pel es dur.	Of the elevation of painful hairs in the afflicted area with an agule when the hair is hard.
Quan son pels no-naturals, durs e aspres e pungentz les huels, lahoras la operacio en lu es que tu prenguas agula subtil e pauses en aquela fiel de ceda subtil e leon, e aprop que tu ajustes las extremitatz de lu e nozes quascu en manieyra mot subtil.	When there are unnatural, hard, and painful hairs in the wounds, the operation on them requires that you use a subtle agule and insert it into that thin thread of silk and lion, and then adjust the extremities of it very gently and handle it in a most subtle manner.
E sia la longitut dels fiels de quantitat de una palma.	And it should be the length of the fingers, about the quantity of a palm.
E aprop tu compon2 autre fiel subtil dejos lu en breu, e nuza las extremitatz de aquel si tu·t vols.	Then take another fine needle, insert it briefly, and twist the ends of that if you wish.
E aprop pause le malaute le sieu cap en le tieu se, e sia prop del solelh per que la tua obra sia declarada, quar es operacio subtil e menuda.	Then position the patient's head in a small space, close to the sun so that your work is made clear, as this is a delicate and precise operation.
E aprop intromet la agulha en la razit del pel ajustat la qual ha necessitat de engen, e fay aquela penetrar en la palpebra festinantment entro que extraguas aquela desus le pel natural.	Then insert the needle into the root of the tight hair where it requires attention, and make it penetrate the eyelid quickly until you extract that from its natural hair.
E aprop tire le pel entro desus e intromet aquel en alixati, e sian les pels un o dos o tres e no mays.	Then pull the hair out from its root, insert that into the tweezers, and grasp one or two or three hairs at a time.
E aprop tira la tua ma am aquel entro que·l pel sia fora-gitat am alixolati en la palpebra am le pel natural.	Then use your hand to pull that out until the hair is completely removed from the tweezers on the eyelid and its natural place.
Mays si es atirat alixalati e non es gitat le pel, atiraras alixati a las partidas dejos am le fiel le qual tu has compost am aquela, entro qu’en sia gitat alixalati del trau sobira.	If it is pulled apart and the skin is not torn, you will pull the dressing to the parts where you have placed the bandage, so that the dressing does not come loose from the wound above.
E vegas aquela am la visio del huel, quar lahoras tu gitaras alixati e lo fiel, e grotan quascu e clautz le huel, e laysse le claus per dos dias o tres, entro que·l pel adheresca al sieu loc e nasque sobre aquel bona carn.	And when you have the sight of the wound, then you will remove the dressing and the bandage, and clean any dirt or claws in the wound, and leave the cloth for two or three days, so that the skin sticks to its place and a good flesh grows over it.
E si es mays breu le pel, lahoras tu ajusta un pel lonc dels pels naturals, e es elevat am aquel, o que·l leysses entro que sia alonguat aprop alcu spazi, e lehoras tu eleva aquel.	And if the skin is too short, you will adjust a longer piece of natural hair, and raise it to that height, or leave it until it grows, so that it extends over some space, and then you will raise it.
Capitol .xiii.	CAPITUL XIII. (In Latin, indicating the title or subject of the chapter.)
De la cura de ehacratir la qual ve en la palpebra desus.	On the treatment of a condition that occurs on the eyelid above.
Quan ve en le huel ehacratir, e es contraccio de la palpebra quan es contrayta en sus, o a dextra o a sinistra partida, per mala consolidacio de plagua o de seccio o de cauteri, e es apelada leporina, e aquesta ahercrati o es natural o accidental, e es fayta per consolidacio de plagua o de seccios o de cauteri, o per semblantz a lor malcuratz.	When you see the eye becoming cloudy, and there is contraction of the eyelid when it closes either to the right or left, due to poor healing of a wound or section or cautery, it is called cataracts, and this cloudiness can be either natural or accidental, caused by the consolidation of wounds or sections or cauterization, or similar to their illnesses.
May la manieyra de la operacio en lu es que tu fendas aquela consolidacio e que separes las labias de lu, e pauses en lu en aquo que es entre aquelas una meca de drap de li, e ligues aquelas entro que sian sanadas.	The manner of the operation is that you open up and separate the consolidation, and divide the lips of it, then place in it a piece of cloth, and bind them together until they heal.
E no cove que tu uses de curacio de lu de las causas las quals exsiccan, constrenho; quar si tu fas aquo retorna alixacratir pus mal que nulh temps no foc habantz.	And be aware that you must use healing methods from the causes that dry out and constrict; for if you do this, it will cause the cataract to return worse than before, with no improvement at all.
Usa en aquela de causas que mollifico ayssi cum es fenugrec, e embroca am la aygua en la qual son coytz altea e semensa de li, o enguent dyaquilon, le qual sia liquefayt am alcu dels olis, e submergeys en aquel la meca, e cura am aquel.	Use for those causes that mollify, such as fenugreek, and soak in water in which the seeds have been cooked or in vinegar, which should be liquid enough with some of the oil, and immerse the cloth in it, and apply to the affected area.
E lo tesaur de la tua curacio es que tu perforsses am tot engen que no sia consolidat segon la forma que foc al comensament.	And the treasure of your cure is that you perforate everything that is not consolidated according to the form in which it appears at the beginning.
E aquesta operacio la qual havem dita, no es sino alcuna rectificacio de ehalixacrati que no retorna la forma del loc segon que foc denant.	And this operation that we have mentioned is nothing other than a correction of deviated components that do not return to the form of the place as it was before.
Capitol .xiiii.	Chapter XIII.
De la cura de ehacrati le qual es fayt en la palpebra dejos.	On the treatment of hernia in the eyelid.
Aquesta alxacrati la qual es fayta en la palpebra dejos, la qual es nompnada vertadierament alxacrati; e es de lu alcuna natural, autra accidental.	This hernia, which is done in the eyelid, and is actually called a "deviation" (not hernia), is either of natural origin or accidental.
Mays accidental es fayta per plagua o per scissura o per cauteri o per autres semblantz.	Accidental hernias can be caused by sickness, incisions, cauterization, or other similar means.
E la via de la operacio de lu es que tu prenguas una agula en la qual haga fil doble, e fiques aquela en la carn, e que la fassas passar del lacrimal de senestre entro al lacrimal dextre, entro que·l fil pervengua en las doas extremitatz de la carn.	And the method of operating is that you take a needle with which you make double thread, and insert it into the flesh, and pass it through the tear from left to right, so that the thread goes through both ends of the flesh.
E aprop exten la carn a las partidas desus am la agula e cus aquela am la agula, e inscideys am spatum ample.	Then extend the flesh apart from its sides with the needle, and cut with a wide spatula.
E donc si retorne la figura de la palpebre segon que cove, bo es; e sino, pren le ray e pausa aquel en la figura fenduda, e am aquel converteys la palpebra, e fen las doas fissuras en le latz de la palpebra dejos.	And so return the eyelid to its original shape if it is suitable; otherwise, take a thread and hold that in the split area, and turn the eyelid over, and make two slits on the edge of the eyelid.
E sian las extremitatz de las doas fissuras de dos angles de la inscizio, la qual has fayta entro que concurren, e sia de lor fayt angle entro que quan se congreguan sia fayta figura de lor.	And the ends of the two slits should form two angles of the incision you made, which meet, and so that when they converge, a shape is formed from them.
E aquesta figura es letra greca: la landa.	And this figure is Greek letter: lambda.
E aprop osta la carn aquela per la quantitat que es le latz de lu agut dejos de lu, aquo que siec la palpebra.	And then push the flesh aside as much as necessary, leaving enough space for the eye to be exposed.
E aprop ajusta las partz seperadas e cos aquelas am le fil de lana; e aprop cura aquelas am aquo que havem dit de las medicinas mollificativas e de las calguas entro que sia sanat.	And then arrange the separated parts and sew them with woolen thread; likewise, treat the affected areas with the medicines mentioned above for softening and washing until it is cured.
E si alxacrati endeve per fissura o sutura o cauteri, lahoras cove que tu fendas am fissura plana sobre les pels de la palpebra segon que es precedit.	And if you need to increase or tighten using incisions, sutures, or cauterization, then make a flat incision in the skin of the eyelid as mentioned above.
E aprop separa am la calgua entre doas labias segon que havem dit.	And then separate the calculus between two lips as mentioned before.
En la suma del sermo de la cura de alxacrati quan es desus o dejos, que corra en lu operacio, segon que es preparat de la forma de alxacrati, e aquela es en forma de motas diversitatz.	In the entire discussion on the treatment of raising or lowering, when it is above or below, let the operation proceed according to the preparation for the form of the raise, and that is in a diverse manner of spots.
E le artifexs savi totz temps prepara engen en quascuna manieyra la qual es possibla a lu entro que fassa retornar la figura a la forma natural, o prop de aquela, e aquel malaute segon que a lu conveneys de la operacio e dels strumentz en las majors disposicios.	And the skilled craftsman always prepares a device in some way that is possible for it to restore the figure to its natural form, or close to it, and treats each illness according to what suits them from the operation and instruments in the best dispositions.
Capitol .xv.	Chapter XV.
De la adherencia de la palpebra am la conjunctiva o am la cornea.	On the adhesion of the eyelid to the conjunctiva or to the cornea.
Quan accideys aquesta consolidacio a motz homes enayssi que sia solidada la palpebra pus desus am le album del huel, e sia prohibida de la facilitat del movement e de las suas obras naturals, donc cove que tu entrometas la extramitat del ray dejos la palpebra, e eleva en sus aquela, o exten aquela am le unci.	When this adhesion occurs in most people, they think that the eyelid is firmly attached to the white part of the eye, and it prevents the ease of movement and its natural functions, so you must insert your finger between the lid and the eyeball, and lift the lid over it, or extend it with the help of a dropper.
E aprop tu inscideys la adherencia am spatum subtil, le qual no sia am acuitat de las inscisios, habantz obtus un petit per so que·l malaute no sia inquietat deves la operacio, e remau le spatum que no ledesca le huel am la sua acuitat.	And then you should incise the adhesion with a fine spatula, which is not sharp enough to cause additional injury, making it slightly blunted so that the disease is not disturbed during the operation, and remove the spatula that does not harm the eye's sensitivity.
E sia la tua inscizio quays excorjan aquela adherencia am facilitat entro que sia retornada la palpebra segon la sua forma natural e que sia sanada tota la adherencia.	And your incision should remove that adhesion easily, so that the eyelid can be returned to its natural form, and all the adhesion is healed.
E aprop tu met en le huel aygua salada am la qual tu laves; o distilla en lu de zunia dissolvut en l’aygua.	Then immerse it in salt water with which you wash; or distill it from sun-warmed water dissolved in the liquid.
E aprop separa entre la palpebra e l’huel am calgua de li, e pausa sobre le huel lana infuza en album de huou, e aprop le tertz jorn usa de causas consolidativas entro que sia sanat.	Then separate the eyelid from the eye with a drop of water, and place on the eye a woolen compress soaked in egg albumen, and for the third day use consolidating causes until it is healed.
Capitol .xvi.	**Chapter XVI.**
De inscizio de ungla e de eminencia de carn dels lacrimals.	On the incision of the eye and the prominence of the flesh of the eyelids.
Sapias que ungla es segon dos manieyras, quar o es nervosa, e es semblant a ciphac dur subtil; o es no-nervosa, semblant a humiditat blanca congilada, la qual quan ferr la toca, o es forsat aquela prendre am onci, es abscindida e le onci no es ficat en lu.	You know that the eyelid is in two manners: either it is nervous, like a thin hard chip; or non-nervous, resembling white frosted moisture, which, when pricked with a needle, is cut off and the chip does not adhere to it.
E amdos las specias no comensan sino del lacrimal major entro que va petit a petit que cobre la vista e prohibeys le lum e·l movement de huel.	And both spices do not begin until the major tear duct, little by little, covers the sight and blocks light and movement of tears.
Mays la manieyra del obrar en la inscizio de lu es que·l malaute pause le sieu cap en le tieu se, e aprop obre les huels de lu, e eleva la palpebra am la tua ma, e aprop colligeys la ungla am onci de pauca duplicacio e exten aquela a las partidas desus.	The manner of operating in the incision of the eye is that the patient's head should be placed under the table, and the eyelids opened with one hand, while the other raises the upper eyelid, and then catches the corner of the eye with a forceps, making a few gentle movements to relax it.
E aprop pren una agula e entromet en aquela un pel de cavalh o de buou o de vaqua, o de semblantz, o de fiel fort, o duplica la extremitat de la agulha petit a petit e fica aquela en le mieg de la ungla, e penetra aquela am la agulha, e lia am fiel la ungla; e exten aquela a las partidas desus, e excorja am le pel le latz de la ungla lo qual siec la pupilla.	And then take a needle and insert it into one of the small hairs from horse, bull, cow, or similar, gradually doubling the end of the needle, leaving it in the middle of the eyelid, and penetrate with the needle, tying the hair to the needle; extend that above the eyelids, and extract the hair from the edge of the eyelid which blocks the pupil.
E ayssi tu sieguas aquela am le pel entro al derier de lu.	And so you extract the hair from behind it.
E aprop tu inscideys le romanent en la razitz del lacrimal am spatum subtil o am petitas forfexs, e leysa la carn del lacrimal natural per so que per inscizio de aquela no endevengua fluxs de lagremas continuabla.	And then carefully incise the membrane at the root of the tear duct with a thin spatula or small scissors, and remove the flesh from the natural tear duct so that by making this incision, continuous flow of tears does not occur.
E alscunas vetz la ungla am le sol onci estenduda o am fiel, ayssi co havem dit, e aprop sia excurjat am spatum leon del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And some also use an ungual (nail) or file, as we have said, and then carefully trim it with a sharp spatula to shape it thus.
E guarda te que am le spatum no toques la tunica cornea e que avengua en lu ruptura, e que la pupilla sia perforada.	And beware that with the spatula, do not touch the corneal tunic and cause its rupture, and that the pupil is not perforated.
Aprop la inscizio geta en le huel un pauc de sal trissa o di cief fayt de siniar, e leyssa aquel entro al autre dia; e aprop cura aquel am aquo que cove entro que sia sanat.	After making the incision, apply a little coarse salt or any suitable medicine, and leave it for about a day; then take care of it until it heals.
E si la ungla no es nervoza e no podes metre la agulha, ni es ficada en aquela le onci, lahoras motas veguadas aquesta specia de ungla es curada am medicinas, e es sanada ayssi cum yeu e recomtat en la divisio.	And if the nail is not nerve-related and you cannot insert the needle, nor is it deeply embedded in the flesh, then attend to this type of nail being cured with medicines, and it will heal thus, when cut off at the division.
E si tu vols inscindir aquela, lahoras tu obre le huel del malaute e pren spatum subtil leon de freul acuitat segon aquesta forma:	And if you wish to incise it, open the wound of the malady and take a thin piece of sharp steel according to this form:
am subtilitat.	with subtility.
E si vezes que aquela es rarificada e es confugida e empren en aquela razit, lahoras distilla de la tua ora en le huel de cief fayt de siniar o am cief rog o am sal trissat, e opila le huel entro a l’autre dia.	And if it becomes hardened and closed up in that wound, slowly extract it from your side in the wound of greatest pain, either with a hot iron or a sharp knife, and keep the wound open for another day.
E aprop itera sobre aquela la operacio entro que sia remaugut tot aquo que es de lu, sino que·l contrari apostema caut sia en le huel, quar lahoras tu leyssa aquela, e cura al comensament la apostema entro que sia sanat.	Then repeat the operation on that part until everything that is infected is removed, otherwise a foul pus will form in the wound, and when you leave it, take care at the beginning of the infection until it is healed.
E aprop itera la tua operacio sobre aquela am razo entro que sia sanat.	Then repeat your operation on that part until it is healed.
La emenencia de la carn lacrimal, si notz en le huel per gran nocument, sia suspendut am onci; e inscideys aquela de aquela una partida, e no ultimes la inscizio per so que no inscidesqua fluxs de lagremas.	The urgency of the lacrimal flesh, if noticed in the eye due to great damage, should be suspended immediately; and incise it from that one part, but do not close the incision so as not to block the flow of tears.
E aprop distilla en le lacrimal cief rog e fayt de siniar entro que sia sanat.	And then distill the main tear duct carefully until it is healed.
Capitol .xvii.	Chapter XVII
De inscizio de alguazardenic e de aquo que es nascut de carn ajustada en le huel.	On the incision of abscesses and that which is born from adherent flesh in the eye.
Alcunas veguadas en les huels de alcus es nascuda carn roga, e es sobre-pausada entro que cobre la pupilla, o apropinqua o estrenh sobre las palpebras e fort leu comprem las palpebras a las partidas deforo e es assemblada a roza de balaustra.	Sometimes in the eyes of certain people, there is flesh that is born sick, and it is so swollen that it covers the pupil or moves very close to the eyelids, pressing them against each other, and it is assembled with rough splints from wood.
Mays la operacio en lu es que·l malaute pausa le sieu cap en le tieu se; e aprop obre les huels de aquel e colligeys tota aquela carn am oncis convenientz ad aquo, e te aquo am una forcep o am cesti; e aprop inscindiys la carn el comensament entro que tot sia finit am le encisori, e guarda te del huel que no ledescas aquel deves la tua operacio.	The surgical procedure is such that the patient holds their side in pain; then open the incision of that area and collect all the flesh with scissors suitable for this, and hold it with a forceps or a basket; then cut the flesh from the beginning until everything is finished with the knife, and be careful of the wound so you do not damage your operation.
E sia la tua inscizio am la qual inscides aquelas o am espatum le qual nos havem recomtat en la inscizio de la ungla, o am petitas forfexs am las quals es colligit ascebel segon que vindra la forma de lu aprop aquest capitol.	And your incision is the one where we incise those or extract the pus that we have extracted in the incision of the finger, or small forceps, collected carefully according to the shape that it takes, appropriately for this chapter.
Donc cum es complida la tua inscizio e es remauguda tota aquela carn, lahoras omple le huel de sal trissa, o destilla en lu polvera roga e semblantz a lu de las medicinas corrossivas, e pausa sobre le huel deforo coto am album de huou entro que sia asegurat de apostema caut.	So when your incision is complete and all that flesh is removed, fill the wound with salt trita (fine-ground salt) or sprinkle on it a powder made from rogues (possibly a type of herb or medicine), similar to corrosive medicines, and place over it a clean cloth or albumen (a protein) until it is assuredly safe from abscess.
E si roman alcuna causa de alguardenici e es senhoragat sanc caut, e temes apostema caut, lahoras leyssa le huel e cura aquela apostema am aquo que ceda aquela apostema, e aprop itera sobre aquel am operacio entro que sia sanat, e semblantment fay en la carn ajustada la qual accideys en le huel de aquesta especia.	And if any cause of inflammation and severe pain is noticed, and there is fear of gangrene, then examine the wound and treat that gangrene with something that relieves that gangrene, and repeatedly perform surgery on it until it is healed, and make sure that the adjacent flesh, which occurs in this particular wound, does not become infected.
Mays empero tu cove que alienes tota curacio del huel freul per via natural o per via accidental, obran am ferr, e no metas la tua ma en alcuna de aquestas operacios entro que veges que aquel membre sia suffertant aquela operacio.	However, it is possible that you may be able to achieve complete cure of the acute pain through natural or accidental means, using a knife, and do not put your hand into any of these operations until you see that the affected member can withstand the operation.
Capitol .xviii.	**Chapter XVIII**
De colleccio de sabel en le huel.	**On the Collection of Knowledge in Wounds**
Sabel so venas rogas las quals son testudas sobre le huel e prohibeysso al vesement la sua operacio, e develican le huel am longitut de dias.	Knowledge comes in various forms, some of which are resistant to treatment and hinder the progression of healing, especially when their duration extends over many days.
Donc necessari es al comensament que tu consideres si le huel en le qual es sabel es fort e en lu no es autra malautia que sabel, lahoras tu colligeys aquel sabel.	Therefore, at the beginning, it is necessary that you consider if the pain in which you are aware is strong and there is no other ailment known in it, then you will collect that knowledge.
E es que tu comandes al malaute que pause le sieu cap en le tieu se, e aprop suspen aquelas venas am un onci o am dos segon la tua prudencia; e sia aquel onci de subtil duplicacio segon aquesta forma:	And command the patient to hold their breath and then gently press those veins with your thumb or index finger, according to your discretion. The pressure should be subtle and of a double nature, following this form:
o so dos oncis gradantment en un cos segon aquesta forma:	or two fingers gradually on one side of the body, following this form:
E aprop sian colligidas aquelas venas am forses subtils, am subtilitat, e abstergeys le sanc hora aprop hora, entro que vegas aquelas venas esser remaugudas del huel e sian revolgudas.	And when those veins are collected with subtle force and carefully, abstain from pressing the sanction immediately; wait until you see those veins refill with blood and feel them pulse.
E guarda te que tu no ledes le huel am las extremitatz del spatum; e si’ la tua operacio en le miegjorn denant le solelh, e sias mot ferm en la tua operacio que no inscidas sino aquelas venas.	And be careful not to cause pain in the extremities of the body; and if your operation is in the morning, facing the sun, and you are strong in your action, do not pierce any veins except those intended.
E quan tu auras complitz, lahoras tu distilla en le huel cief vert o rog per que am sa acuitat corrodesca aquo que es remaugut del sabel.	And when you have finished, then distil warm vinegar or wine into the wound to corrode whatever remains of the pus.

E aprop itera sobre lu segon que la mateyssa manieyra entro que sia sanat.	And repeat this process according to the nature of the illness until it is healed.

Capitol .xx.	**Chapter XX.**
De reduccio de la eminencia del huel.	**On the Reduction of Swelling**
